org.fcrepo.server.security.xacml.pep

Interface ContextHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextHandlerImpl

    public interface ContextHandler
    This interface represents the bridge between the PEP and the PDP. It is responsible for building requests and passing them to the PDP. It then receives the response and passes it to the PEP.
    Author:
    nishen@melcoe.mq.edu.au

    • Method Detail

      • buildRequest

        com.sun.xacml.ctx.RequestCtx buildRequest(List<Map<URI,List<com.sun.xacml.attr.AttributeValue>>> subjects,
                                        Map<URI,com.sun.xacml.attr.AttributeValue> actions,
                                        Map<URI,com.sun.xacml.attr.AttributeValue> resources,
                                        Map<URI,com.sun.xacml.attr.AttributeValue> environment)
                                          throws PEPException
        Creates a new Request.
        Parameters:
        subjects - a list of Map containing the attributes for a set of subjects.
        actions - the URI of the requested Action.
        resources - a Map containing the attributes for a resource.
        environment - Map containing the attributes for the environment.
        Returns:
        a request context for a PDP to handle.
        Throws:
        PEPException

      • evaluate

        com.sun.xacml.ctx.ResponseCtx evaluate(com.sun.xacml.ctx.RequestCtx reqCtx)
                                       throws PEPException
        Parameters:
        reqCtx - an XACML request context for resolution.
        Returns:
        an XACML response context based on the evaluation of the request context.
        Throws:
        PEPException

      • evaluate

        String evaluate(String req)
                throws PEPException
        Parameters:
        req - an XACML request as a string for resolution.
        Returns:
        an XACML response as a string based on the evaluation of the request context.
        Throws:
        PEPException

      • evaluateBatch

        String evaluateBatch(String[] requests)
                     throws PEPException
        Parameters:
        requests - an array of XACML requests as strings for resolution.
        Returns:
        an XACML response as a string based on the evaluation of the request context.
        Throws:
        PEPException
